This app was made to obtain and parse an XML RSS Feed from Traffic Scotland and display that information.

The data is parsed using XML Pull parser and displayed in two different ways.The first is using a list view for the three feeds which is shown in the navigation menu opened by pressing the three lines in the top right.

The List Views are also filterable. The Current Incidents are Filterable by the Location while the Roadworks and the Planned Roadworks are Filterable by Location,Start Date and End Date. Start and End Date filters must be entered in the correct format(Mon Jan 01).

On each page it is possible to View the Data in a Google Map. If a List Item is clicked it will show that singular item on a map while if the Show All on Map button is clicked the while list will be added to a map as Markers.
